tagline: Detects emerging trends early by reading weak signals from niche communities, data, and cultural shifts.
pros: Spots emerging trends months before mainstream recognition
Builds probability-weighted scenarios instead of false-precision forecasts
Triangulates across quantitative data and cultural signals
Tracks and calibrates own accuracy over time
cons: Scenarios can feel ambiguous to people who want definitive answers
Effectiveness depends on ongoing monitoring investment
Cultural fluency may not cover every niche or geography equally
